2_fact_auth_note: Protect your Mesa account with an extra layer of security. Once configured, you'll be required to enter both your password and an authentication code from your mobile phone in order to sign in.
disable_note: Disabling your account means you can recover it at any time after taking this action.

delete_warning: Are you sure that you want to delete your account? This will immediately log you out of your account and you will not be able to log in again.
